name: bouncy arts
description:
Play as a ball with the ability to slow down the time. But be aware that with each use of your special ability you have to sacrifice a part of your health, so use it wisely.



A tip how to perform the powerful jump:
  1. pressing and holding the right mouse button to activate slow motion
  2. aim for the direction and press the left mouse button
  3. release the right mouse button

Have fun!
